text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma, nan adarasi, ia tuivigh gavgavigh osɨmtɨziba aterɨva egh Ekiam mɨzuamtɨ a ua izam. Ia fo, gumazir azenim itim, a dagher aghuiba an azenimɨn aghungasa an adav zuai. Egha a gavgavim uan navim ganɨga egha aghumra ikiava amozim ko aruem mɨzuai, aning uan ingangarim faragh a damuam. Eghtɨ a gɨn dagheba iniam.
